title: Vaaren Vaaren Seema Raja Lyrics From Seema Raja Movie
stanzas:
Vaaren Vaaren Seema Raja
vazhiya vidungadaa
naan vesamillaa paasakkaran
nesanthaan nambungadaa (2)

suyanalame podhunalamaa
yethuvene kodiya
en podhunalamum suyanalamthaan
paathuko en padaiya

en pera ketka koodum paaru
arangu arangu.
naan yezhaiketha
aeroplanu othungu othungu (2)

poati potu anbu senju
like-a allum en settai
nokkam pola karuthum solli
vaangi poven paaraatta

vevasaayi illaiyinna
aduppula sorum pongaathudaa
periyorgal sonnaalume
adhaiye naanum solluvendaa

ye oorellaam empadatha
pota aagum trend-u
naan vaalillaa pattaampoochi
ellarukkum naan friendu

edhiriyaave irunthaalum
avana madhikka palaganumdaa
valadhu kaiyu kodukkuradhu
edathu kaikkum theriyanumda

Vaaren Vaaren Seema Raja
vazhiya vidungadaa
naan vesamillaa paasakkaran
nesanthaan nambungadaa

kaala vaara nooru peru
safe-ah nee game aadu.
thookki vidathaan kodi peru
thuninji nee poraadu

panangaasu serthu vachchaa
sugar BP yerumadaa
one by two tea kudichaa
athuthan tasteu kelungadaa

naan veeraappa kattiputtu
thandhathilla dimikki
yaar jalrawayum thattayila
vasippene amukki

degree vaangi kuvichaalum
tamizhe namakku
thani peruma.
aracha maava arachaalum
adhukkum venum
oru therama.

Vaaren Vaaren Seema Raja
vazhiya vidungadaa
naan vesamillaa paasakkaran
nesanthaan nambungadaa (2)
category: Song:Vaaren Vaaren Seema Raja - Seema Raja
